short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your fonts together and use them in web design

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your fonts together and use them in web design !!
This extension focuses on live loading various fonts on any website on internet and adding all favourite fonts in one place.

🤷🏻‍♂️ Why ?
Every time we visit different sites on the internet we sometimes wish the UI could load up in our desired font or sometimes especially designers find a cool font and want to save it, so to try it on other websites.

🤔 What ?
"Font bucket" extension serves these processes, where user can easily save their fav fonts and simultaneously apply them on different websites.

😎 How ?
Use in 3 simple Steps:
👉🏻 Navigate to https://fonts.google.com/ and select a font.
👉🏻 Copy the href tag value of the link generated by google of that font.
👉🏻 Open the extension and add thee the copied value to link textbox and hit "Add" Button.

To apply font on a site:
👉🏻 Navigate to the desired site you wish to apply your font.
👉🏻 Open the extension and select font you wish to apply from the dropdown.
👉🏻 Hit on "Apply" Button. Boom!! Your site font is changed now. 

Stay hungry 🧠 Stay foolish 🤪
